description:
"The Forgotten Land" is a turn-based "Combat & Puzzle Match 3" with streamlined RPG and Management elements in a Dark Fantasy setting.

⬤ Set up your camp!
⬤ Show your combat skills!
⬤ Develop your own strategy! 
⬤ Level up!
⬤ Test your mettle!
name: The Forgotten Land
intro: Match 3 with RPG and Management elements
